name: sergio
title: Personal Profile
description: I am a professional with experience in Web Design and Front-End Development. I am dedicated, creative, efficient and highly focused in finishing projects with high-quality standards. My strength is developing websites with HTML, CSS, JavaScript/JQuery, Responsive design. I also have experience designing wireframes, mock-ups, email marketing, good handling of Photoshop and Illustrator with experience in commercial environments (agency work), and good understanding of Wordpress themes development.
technologies: Sequelize, MySQL, ORM, express.js, jest, Next.js, React, JavaScript, PHP, Wordpress, Github, Node.js, NPM, Gulp, Sass, CSS, HTML, JQuery, Google Tag Manager, Jira (project management).
